greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Sum T(n,k) of multinomials M(n; lambda), where lambda ranges over all partitions of n into parts that form a set of size k; triangle T(n,k), n>=0, 0<=k<=A003056(n), read by rows.
link: Alois P. Heinz, Rows n = 0..200, flattened
maple: T:= (n, k)-> add(multinomial(add(i, i=l), l[], 0), l=
b:= proc(n, i) option remember; expand(`if`(n=0, 1,
T:= n-> (p-> seq(coeff(p, x, i), i=0..degree(p)))(b(n$2)):
mathematica: b[n_, i_] := b[n, i] = Expand[If[n == 0, 1, If[i<1, 0, Sum[x^Sign[j]*b[n - i*j, i-1]*multinomial[n, Join[{n-i*j}, Table[i, {j}]]], {j, 0, n/i}]]]];
T /@ Range[0, 14] // Flatten (* _Jean-François Alcover_, May 06 2020, after 2nd Maple program *)
xref: Cf. A000217, A003056, A022915, A131632 (when the parts are distinct), A226874.
results.author: _Alois P. Heinz_, Sep 25 2019
